# theme

**Article**

Sets the color scheme for an element.

## Overview

Setting the `theme` attribute changes the font color for text. Badge colors are also affected if the color is changed using CSS. The background image is not affected by the `theme` attribute. Templates default to `light` unless otherwise specified. `theme` can be used with all templates. The following templates default to `dark`:

- [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/producttemplate]
- [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/productbundletemplate]

### Values for theme



### Elements that Use theme

The `theme` attribute can be used with any element.

## Valid TVML Attributes

- **autoHighlight**: Specifies that the element should initially be in focus.
- **binding**: Associates information in a data item with an element.
- **layoutDirection**: Specifies the direction in which text is displayed.
- **prototype**: Associates a data item type with an element.
